audit.description: Generate a security audit report for this n8n instance

categories.name: categories
categories.description: Comma-separated list of categories to include in the audit

days-abandoned-workflow.name: days-abandoned-workflow
days-abandoned-workflow.description: Days for a workflow to be considered abandoned if not executed

file.name: file
file.description: path to a workflow file to execute

id.name: id
id.description: id of the workflow to execute

rawOutput.name: rawOutput
rawOutput.description: Outputs only JSON data, with no other text

debug.name: debug
debug.description: Toggles on displaying all errors and debug messages.

ids.name: ids
ids.description: Specifies workflow IDs to get executed, separated by a comma or a file containing the ids

concurrency.name: concurrency
concurrency.description: How many workflows can run in parallel. Defaults to 1 which means no concurrency.

output.name: output
output.description: Enable execution saving, You must inform an existing folder to save execution via this param

snapshot.name: snapshot
snapshot.description: Enables snapshot saving. You must inform an existing folder to save snapshots via this param.

compare.name: compare
compare.description: Compares current execution with an existing snapshot. You must inform an existing folder where the snapshots are saved.

shallow.name: shallow
shallow.description: Compares only if attributes output from node are the same, with no regards to nested JSON objects.

skipList.name: skipList
skipList.description: File containing a comma separated list of workflow IDs to skip.

retries.name: retries
retries.description: Retries failed workflows up to N tries. Default is 1. Set 0 to disable.

shortOutput.name: shortOutput
shortOutput.description: Omits the full execution information from output, displaying only summary.

start.description: Starts n8n. Makes Web-UI available and starts active workflows

open.name: open
open.description: opens the UI automatically in browser

tunnel.name: tunnel
tunnel.description: runs the webhooks via a hooks.n8n.cloud tunnel server. Use only for testing and development!

reinstallMissingPackages.name: reinstallMissingPackages
reinstallMissingPackages.description: Attempts to self heal n8n if packages with nodes are missing. Might drastically increase startup times.

webhook.description: Starts n8n webhook process. Intercepts only production URLs.

concurrency.name: concurrency
concurrency.description: How many jobs can run in parallel.

backup.name: backup
backup.description: Sets --all --pretty --separate for simple backups. Only --output has to be set additionally.

id.name: id
id.description: The ID of the credential to export

output.name: output
output.description: Output file name or directory if using separate files

pretty.name: pretty
pretty.description: Format the output in an easier to read fashion

separate.name: separate
separate.description: Exports one file per credential (useful for versioning). Must inform a directory via --output.

decrypted.name: decrypted
decrypted.description: Exports data decrypted / in plain text. ALL SENSITIVE INFORMATION WILL BE VISIBLE IN THE FILES. Use to migrate from a installation to another that have a different secret key (in the config file).

backup.name: backup
backup.description: Sets --all --pretty --separate for simple backups. Only --output has to be set additionally.

id.name: id
id.description: The ID of the workflow to export

output.name: output
output.description: Output file name or directory if using separate files

pretty.name: pretty
pretty.description: Format the output in an easier to read fashion

separate.name: separate
separate.description: Exports one file per workflow (useful for versioning). Must inform a directory via --output.

input.name: input
input.description: Input file name or directory if --separate is used

separate.name: separate
separate.description: Imports *.json files from directory provided by --input

userId.name: userId
userId.description: The ID of the user to assign the imported credentials to

input.name: input
input.description: Input file name or directory if --separate is used

separate.name: separate
separate.description: Imports *.json files from directory provided by --input

userId.name: userId
userId.description: The ID of the user to assign the imported workflows to

ldap:reset.description: Resets the database to the default ldap state

active.name: active
active.description: Filters workflows by active status. Can be true or false

onlyId.name: onlyId
onlyId.description: Outputs workflow IDs only, one per line.

active.name: active
active.description: Active state the workflow/s should be set to

id.name: id
id.description: The ID of the workflow to operate on

user-management:reset.description: Resets the database to the default user state
